quotes: No two persons ever read the same book.
author: Edmund Wilson

quotes: A book is a dream that you hold in your hand.
author: Neil Gaiman

quotes: Whenever you read a good book, somewhere in the world a door opens to allow in more light.
author: Vera Nazarian

quotes: If we encounter a man of rare intellect, we should ask him what books he reads.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes: There comes a time when you have to choose between turning the page and closing the book.
author: Josh Jameson

quotes: I would never read a book if it were possible for me to talk half an hour with the man who wrote it.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes: Always read something that will make you look good if you die in the middle of it.
author: P.J. O’Rourke

quotes: I think of life as a good book. The further you get into it, the more it begins to make sense.
author: Harold Kushner

quotes: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking.
author: Haruki Murakami

quotes: There are many little ways to enlarge your child’s world. Love of books is the best of all.
author: Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis

quotes: Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him.
author: Maya Angelou

quotes: The book you don’t read won’t help.
author: Jim Rohn

quotes: Great books help you understand, and they help you feel understood.
author: John Green

quotes: A good novel tells us the truth about its hero; but a bad novel tells us the truth about its author.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes: There is a great deal of difference between an eager man who wants to read a book and the tired man who wants a book to read.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes: A book is a version of the world. If you do not like it, ignore it or offer your own version in return.
author: Salman Rushdie

quotes: In a good book the best is between the lines.
author: Swedish Proverb

quotes: Are we not like two volumes of one book?
author: Marceline Desbordes-Valmore

quotes: Keep reading books, but remember that a book is only a book, and you should learn to think for yourself.
author: Maxim Gorky

quotes: It is what you read when you don’t have to that determines what you will be when you can’t help it.
author: Oscar Wilde

quotes: There are perhaps no days of our childhood we lived so fully as those we spent with a favorite book.
author: Marcel Proust

quotes: The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde

quotes: Beware of the person of one book.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes: A book is the only place in which you can examine a fragile thought without breaking it.
author: Edward P. Morgan

quotes: If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quotes: The only important thing in a book is the meaning that it has for you.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes: Reading a book is like re-writing it for yourself.
author: Angela Carter

quotes: There’s nothing wrong with reading a book you love over and over.
author: Gail Carson Levine

quotes: It is a good rule after reading a new book, never to allow yourself another new one till you have read an old one in between.
author: C.S. Lewis

quotes: Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes: Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren’t very new after all.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes: I can’t imagine a man really enjoying a book and reading it only once.
author: C.S. Lewis

quotes: Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes: A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading.
author: William Styron

quotes: One always has a better book in one’s mind than one can manage to get onto paper.
author: Michael Cunningham

quotes: I divide all readers into two classes; those who read to remember and those who read to forget.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes: In old days books were written by men of letters and read by the public. Nowadays books are written by the public and read by nobody.
author: Oscar Wilde

quotes: There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes: What you don’t know would make a great book.
author: Sydney Smith

quotes: You know you’ve read a good book when you turn the last page and feel a little as if you have lost a friend.
author: Paul Sweeney

quotes: I cannot sleep unless I am surrounded by books.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes: Some books leave us free and some books make us free.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes: Men do not understand books until they have a certain amount of life, or at any rate no man understands a deep book, until he has seen and lived at least part of its contents.
author: Ezra Pound

quotes: That is a good book which is opened with expectation and closed with profit.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes: Once you learn to read, you will be forever free.
author: Frederick Douglas

quotes: Books are like mirrors: if a fool looks in, you cannot expect a genius to look out.
author: J.K. Rowling

quotes: A book is a device to ignite the imagination.
author: Alan Bennett

quotes: It’s not just the books under fire now that worry me. It is the books that will never be written. The books that will never be read.
author: Toni Morrison

quotes: A good book has no ending.
author: R.D. Cumming
